definition: foot/leg (of an animal or an object)/base (of an object)/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]/classifier for kicks
but/yet/however/while/to go back/to decline/to retreat/nevertheless/even though
hand and foot/movement of limbs/action/trick/step in a procedure (CL: 道[dao4])
naturally-formed feet (as opposed to bound feet 小腳|小脚[xiao3 jiao3])/long kick (soccer)/Bigfoot (mythological animal)
Chinese boxing/fist and feet/punching and kicking
to have one's feet firmly planted on the ground (idiom); realistic without flights of fancy/steady and serious character
lit. to punch and kick (idiom); to beat up/fig. determined to sort out a problem
to stay for a time/to stop over/to lodge/to sink down (into soft ground)/leftovers

sentences.english: It is imbroglio of feeling's kind And enmity holding up his feet.
sentences.chinese: 是感情的恩恩怨怨的纠葛绊住了脚。

sentences.english: He maketh my feet like hinds' feet: and setteth me upon my high places.
sentences.chinese: 他使我的脚快如母鹿的蹄，又使我在高处安稳。

sentences.english: The poor old man plods along, hardly able to lift each food.
sentences.chinese: 这可怜白勺白叟吃力地走着，几乎都抬不动脚了。

sentences.english: See, I stopped at the red traffic light, and I swear it never turned green!
sentences.chinese: 红灯亮了，我踩了脚刹车，谁知道那灯再没变绿过。

sentences.english: the massive foot stomps down where he just was.
sentences.chinese: 机甲硕大的脚重重地踏在他刚才的位置上。

sentences.english: As it was dark, he stubbed his toe against the table leg.
sentences.chinese: 由于天暗看不见，他的脚趾碰到了桌子脚。
我的脚已经麻了，感觉不到任何疼痛。

sentences.english: And grows erect as that comes home.
sentences.chinese: 当那只脚回到家，它又把腰杆直起。

sentences.english: He spread a net for my feet and turned me back.
sentences.chinese: 他铺下网罗，绊我的脚，使我转回。
大多数的昆虫都有六只脚。

sentences.english: He's a real klutz and will probably step on your feet!
sentences.chinese: 他是个傻瓜，而且可能会踩你的脚的。

sentences.english: The prisoner had on his feet fetters weighing fifty pounds.
sentences.chinese: 这犯人的脚上有一对五十斤重的铁球。

sentences.english: I tap my feet and sing along with him.
sentences.chinese: 我轻拍着脚，和他一起唱起来。

sentences.english: In that day the Lord will snatch away their finery: the bangles and headbands and crescent necklaces
sentences.chinese: 到那日，主必除掉她们华美的脚钏，发网，月牙圈。

sentences.english: Generously padded footbed massages the foot with each and every step.
sentences.chinese: 慷慨填充鞋垫按摩脚每一步。

sentences.english: Harris removes it and smashes it on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 哈里斯拿掉了这个装置，并用脚踩碎在地上。

definition: variant of 腳趾|脚趾[jiao3 zhi3]
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
